1.title: Morning Opening Dhikr
1.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ النُّشُورُ
1.transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna wa bika amsayna wa bika nahya wa bika namut wa ilaykan-nushur.
1.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening. By You we live and by You we die, and to You is the resurrection.

2.title: Morning Tawhid Renewal
2.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
2.transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbi la ilaha illa anta khalaqtani wa ana ‘abduk wa ana ‘ala ‘ahdika wa wa‘dika mastata‘t. A‘udzu bika min sharri ma sana‘t. Abu’u laka bini‘matika ‘alayya wa abu’u bidhanbi faghfir li fa innahu la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa anta.
2.translation: O Allah, You are my Lord. None has the right to be worshipped except You. You created me and I am Your servant. I remain faithful to my covenant and promise to You as best as I can. I seek refuge in You from the evil of what I have done. I acknowledge Your blessings upon me and I acknowledge my sins, so forgive me, for none forgives sins except You.

3.title: Morning Protection Dhikr
3.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
3.transliteration: Bismillahil-ladzi la yadurru ma‘asmihi shay’un fil-ardi wa la fis-sama’i wa huwas-sami‘ul-‘alim.
3.translation: In the name of Allah, with whose Name nothing on earth or in the heavens can harm, and He is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

4.title: Evening Opening Dhikr
4.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
4.transliteration: Allahumma bika amsayna wa bika asbahna wa bika nahya wa bika namut wa ilaykal-masir.
4.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning. By You we live and by You we die, and to You is the final return.

5.title: Evening Protection
5.arabic: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
5.transliteration: Amsayna wa amsal-mulku lillah walhamdu lillah la ilaha illa Allah wahdahu la sharika lah lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamd wa huwa ‘ala kulli shay’in qadir.
5.translation: We have reached the evening and all dominion belongs to Allah. All praise is for Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, without partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise, and He has power over all things.

6.title: Evening Gratitude
6.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ مَا أَمْسَى بِي مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ أَوْ بِأَحَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ فَمِنْكَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَلَكَ الشُّكْرُ
6.transliteration: Allahumma ma amsa bi min ni‘matin aw bi ahadin min khalqika faminka wahdaka la sharika lak falakal-hamd wa lakash-shukr.
6.translation: O Allah, whatever blessing has reached me this evening or any of Your creation is from You alone without partner. So to You belongs all praise and all thanks.

7.title: Before Sleep Dhikr
7.translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

8.title: Sleep Protection
8.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ قِنِي عَذَابَكَ يَوْمَ تَبْعَثُ عِبَادَكَ
8.translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the Day You resurrect Your servants.

9.title: Travel Dua
9.arabic: اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَى رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ اللَّهُمَّ إِنَّا نَسْأَلُكَ فِي سَفَرِنَا هَذَا الْبِرَّ وَالتَّقْوَى وَمِنَ الْعَمَلِ مَا تَرْضَى
9.transliteration: Allahu akbar, Allahu akbar, Allahu akbar. Subhanalladzi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrinin wa inna ila rabbina lamunqalibun. Allahumma inna nas’aluka fi safarina hadhal-birra wat-taqwa wa minal-‘amali ma tardha.
9.translation: Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest, Allah is the Greatest. Glory be to the One who subjected this for us, and we could not have done it by ourselves. And indeed to our Lord we will return. O Allah, we ask You in this journey of ours for righteousness, piety, and deeds that please You.

10.title: Arrival from Travel
10.translation: We return repentant, worshipping, and praising our Lord.

11.title: Seeking Forgiveness
11.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ دِقَّهُ وَجِلَّهُ وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ وَعَلَانِيَتَهُ وَسِرَّهُ
11.transliteration: Allahummaghfir li dhanbi kullahu diqqahu wa jillahu wa awwalahu wa akhirahu wa ‘alaniyatahu wa sirrahu.
11.translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins: the small and the great, the first and the last, the open and the hidden.

12.title: Greatest Forgiveness Dua
12.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي ظُلْمًا كَثِيرًا وَلَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ فَاغْفِرْ لِي مَغْفِرَةً مِنْ عِنْدِكَ وَارْحَمْنِي إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
12.transliteration: Allahumma inni zalamtu nafsi zulman kathiran wa la yaghfirudh-dhunuba illa anta faghfir li maghfiratan min ‘indika warhamni innaka antal-ghafurur-rahim.
12.translation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself, and none forgives sins except You. So forgive me with a forgiveness from You and have mercy on me. Indeed, You are the Most Forgiving, Most Merciful.

13.title: Dua for Ease
13.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَا سَهْلَ إِلَّا مَا جَعَلْتَهُ سَهْلًا وَأَنْتَ تَجْعَلُ الْحَزْنَ إِذَا شِئْتَ سَهْلًا
13.transliteration: Allahumma la sahla illa ma ja‘altahu sahlan wa anta taj‘alul-hazna idha shi’ta sahla.
13.translation: O Allah, nothing is easy except what You make easy, and You can make the difficult easy if You will.

14.title: Relief from Distress
14.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ سُبْحَانَكَ إِنِّي كُنْتُ مِنَ الظَّالِمِينَ
14.transliteration: La ilaha illa anta subhanaka inni kuntu minaz-zalimin.
14.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except You. Glory be to You. Indeed, I have been among the wrongdoers.

15.title: Protection from Anxiety
15.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَالْحَزَنِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْعَجْزِ وَالْكَسَلِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْجُبْنِ وَالْبُخْلِ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ غَلَبَةِ الدَّيْنِ وَقَهْرِ الرِّجَالِ
15.transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udhu bika minal-hammi wal-hazan wa a‘udhu bika minal-‘ajzi wal-kasal wa a‘udhu bika minal-jubni wal-bukhl wa a‘udhu bika min ghalabatid-dayni wa qahrir-rijal.
15.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from anxiety and sorrow, from weakness and laziness, from cowardice and miserliness, and from being overpowered by debt and by people.

16.title: Seeking Knowledge
16.translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

17.title: Beneficial Knowledge
17.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
17.transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka ‘ilman nafi‘an wa rizqan tayyiban wa ‘amalan mutaqabbalan.
17.translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, pure provision, and accepted deeds.

18.title: Guidance
18.translation: O Allah, guide me and keep me firm on the right path.

19.title: For Parents
19.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَارْحَمْهُمَا كَمَا رَبَّيَانِي صَغِيرًا
19.transliteration: Rabbighfir li wa liwalidayya warhamhuma kama rabbayani saghira.
19.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and have mercy on them as they raised me when I was small.

20.title: For Family
20.arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
20.transliteration: Rabbana hab lana min azwajina wa dhurriyyatina qurrata a‘yun waj‘alna lil-muttaqina imama.
20.translation: Our Lord, grant us from among our spouses and offspring comfort to our eyes and make us leaders of the righteous.

21.title: Entering Home
21.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ الْمَوْلِجِ وَخَيْرَ الْمَخْرَجِ بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَى اللَّهِ رَبِّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
21.transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka khayral-mawlij wa khayral-makhraj. Bismillah walajna wa bismillah kharajna wa ‘alallahi rabbina tawakkalna.
21.translation: O Allah, I ask You for the best entrance and the best exit. In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon Allah our Lord we rely.

22.title: Leaving Home
22.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللَّهِ لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
22.transliteration: Bismillah tawakkaltu ‘alallah la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah.
22.translation: In the name of Allah, I rely upon Allah. There is no power and no strength except with Allah.

24.title: After Eating
24.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنِي هَذَا وَرَزَقَنِيهِ مِنْ غَيْرِ حَوْلٍ مِنِّي وَلَا قُوَّةٍ
24.transliteration: Alhamdulillahil-ladzi at‘amani hadha wa razaqanihi min ghayri hawlin minni wa la quwwah.
24.translation: All praise is for Allah who fed me this and provided it for me without any power or strength from myself.

25.title: For Health
25.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَدَنِي اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي سَمْعِي اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصَرِي
25.transliteration: Allahumma ‘afini fi badani Allahumma ‘afini fi sam‘i Allahumma ‘afini fi basari.
25.translation: O Allah, grant me health in my body, O Allah grant me health in my hearing, O Allah grant me health in my sight.

26.title: For Healing
26.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ أَذْهِبِ الْبَأْسَ اشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي لَا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
26.transliteration: Allahumma rabban-nas adhhibil-ba’s ishfi anta ash-shafi la shifa’a illa shifa’uka shifa’an la yughadiru saqama.
26.translation: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the harm and cure. You are the Healer. There is no healing except Your healing — a healing that leaves no illness behind.

27.title: Protection from Evil
27.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
27.transliteration: A‘udhu bikalimatillahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.
27.translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He created.

28.title: Protection for Children
28.arabic: أُعِيذُكُمَا بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّةِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ
28.transliteration: U‘idhukuma bikalimatillahit-tammah min kulli shaytanin wa hammah wa min kulli ‘aynin lammah.
28.translation: I seek protection for you both in the perfect words of Allah from every devil, every harmful creature, and every evil eye.

29.title: Entering Market
29.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ حَيٌّ لَا يَمُوتُ بِيَدِهِ الْخَيْرُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
29.transliteration: La ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lah, lahul-mulk wa lahul-hamd yuhyi wa yumit wa huwa hayyun la yamut biyadihil-khayr wa huwa ‘ala kulli shay’in qadir.
29.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and all praise. He gives life and causes death, and He is Living and never dies. In His hand is all good, and He has power over all things.

30.title: Seeking Protection from Hell
30.translation: O Allah, protect me from the Fire.

31.title: Seeking Paradise
31.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْجَنَّةَ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ النَّارِ
31.transliteration: Allahumma inni as’alukal-jannah wa a‘udhu bika minan-nar.
31.translation: O Allah, I ask You for Paradise and seek refuge in You from the Fire.

32.title: Istikhara
32.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَخِيرُكَ بِعِلْمِكَ وَأَسْتَقْدِرُكَ بِقُدْرَتِكَ وَأَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ الْعَظِيمِ فَإِنَّكَ تَقْدِرُ وَلَا أَقْدِرُ وَتَعْلَمُ وَلَا أَعْلَمُ وَأَنْتَ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوبِ اللَّهُمَّ إِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ هَذَا الْأَمْرَ خَيْرٌ لِي فِي دِينِي وَمَعَاشِي وَعَاقِبَةِ أَمْرِي فَاقْدُرْهُ لِي وَيَسِّرْهُ لِي ثُمَّ بَارِكْ لِي فِيهِ وَإِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّهُ شَرٌّ لِي فَاصْرِفْهُ عَنِّي وَاصْرِفْنِي عَنْهُ وَاقْدُرْ لِيَ الْخَيْرَ حَيْثُ كَانَ ثُمَّ أَرْضِنِي بِهِ
32.transliteration: Allahumma inni astakhiruka bi ‘ilmika wa astaqdiruka bi qudratika wa as’aluka min fadlikal-‘azim fa innaka taqdiru wa la aqdir wa ta‘lamu wa la a‘lam wa anta ‘allamul-ghuyub. Allahumma in kunta ta‘lamu anna hadhal-amra khayrun li fi dini wa ma‘ashi wa ‘aqibati amri faqdurhu li wa yassirhu li thumma barik li fihi. Wa in kunta ta‘lamu annahu sharrun li fasrifhu ‘anni wasrifni ‘anhu waqdur li al-khayra haythu kana thumma ardini bih.
32.translation: O Allah, I seek Your guidance through Your knowledge and seek ability through Your power, and I ask You from Your great bounty. You have power and I do not. You know and I do not. You are the Knower of the unseen. O Allah, if You know this matter to be good for me in my religion, my life, and the end of my affairs, then decree it for me, make it easy for me, and bless it for me. And if You know it to be bad for me, then turn it away from me and turn me away from it, and decree for me what is good wherever it may be, and make me content with it.

33.title: When Waking at Night
33.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
33.transliteration: La ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lah lahul-mulk wa lahul-hamd wa huwa ‘ala kulli shay’in qadir. Subhanallah walhamdulillah wa la ilaha illallah wallahu akbar wa la hawla wa la quwwata illa billah.
33.translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone, with no partner. To Him belongs the dominion and all praise, and He has power over all things. Glory be to Allah, all praise is for Allah, none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, Allah is the Greatest, and there is no power nor strength except with Allah.

34.title: When Angry
34.translation: I seek refuge in Allah from Satan, the accursed.

35.title: For Steadfastness
35.arabic: يَا مُقَلِّبَ الْقُلُوبِ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَى دِينِكَ
35.translation: O Turner of hearts, keep my heart firm upon Your religion.

36.title: Best Dhikr
36.translation: Glory be to Allah and praise be to Him.

37.title: Heavy on Scale
37.translation: Glory be to Allah the Magnificent and praise be to Him.

38.title: Tasbih Fatimah
38.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ ٣٣ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٣٣ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ ٣٤
38.translation: Glory be to Allah 33 times, praise be to Allah 33 times, and Allah is the Greatest 34 times.

39.title: Morning & Evening Protection
39.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ النُّشُورُ
39.transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna wa bika amsayna wa bika nahya wa bika namut wa ilaykan-nushur.
39.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the resurrection.

40.title: Evening Version
40.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ
40.transliteration: Allahumma bika amsayna wa bika asbahna wa bika nahya wa bika namut wa ilaykal-masir.
40.translation: O Allah, by You we enter the evening and by You we enter the morning, by You we live and by You we die, and to You is the final return.

41.title: After Wudu
41.arabic: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
41.transliteration: Ashhadu an la ilaha illallah wahdahu la sharika lah wa ashhadu anna Muhammadan ‘abduhu wa rasuluh.
41.translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone with no partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His servant and messenger.

42.title: Entering Masjid
42.translation: O Allah, open for me the doors of Your mercy.

43.title: Leaving Masjid
43.translation: O Allah, I ask You from Your bounty.

44.title: For Rizq
44.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِي بِحَلَالِكَ عَنْ حَرَامِكَ وَأَغْنِنِي بِفَضْلِكَ عَمَّنْ سِوَاكَ
44.transliteration: Allahummakfini bihalalika ‘an haramika wa aghnini bifadlika ‘amman siwak.
44.translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have made lawful instead of what You have made unlawful, and enrich me by Your bounty from needing anyone besides You.

45.title: For Contentment
45.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَضِّنِي بِمَا قَضَيْتَ وَبَارِكْ لِي فِيمَا أُعْطِيتَ
45.transliteration: Allahumma raddini bima qadayt wa barik li fima a‘tayt.
45.translation: O Allah, make me content with what You have decreed and bless me in what You have given.

46.title: Protection from Shirk
46.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أُشْرِكَ بِكَ وَأَنَا أَعْلَمُ وَأَسْتَغْفِرُكَ لِمَا لَا أَعْلَمُ
46.transliteration: Allahumma inni a‘udzu bika an ushrika bika wa ana a‘lam wa astaghfiruka lima la a‘lam.
46.translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from associating partners with You knowingly, and I ask Your forgiveness for what I do unknowingly.

47.title: Best Supplication
47.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
47.transliteration: Allahumma atina fid-dunya hasanah wa fil-akhirati hasanah wa qina ‘adhaban-nar.
47.translation: O Allah, give us good in this world and good in the Hereafter and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

48.title: For Firm Faith
48.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ يَا مُصَرِّفَ الْقُلُوبِ صَرِّفْ قُلُوبَنَا عَلَى طَاعَتِكَ
48.transliteration: Allahumma ya musarrifal-qulub sarrif qulubana ‘ala ta‘atik.
48.translation: O Controller of hearts, direct our hearts to Your obedience.

49.title: Seeking Good End
49.translation: O Allah, grant us a good ending.

50.title: Comprehensive Good
50.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الشَّرِّ كُلِّهِ عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ مَا عَلِمْتُ مِنْهُ وَمَا لَمْ أَعْلَمْ
50.transliteration: Allahumma inni as’aluka minal-khayri kullihi ‘ajilihi wa ajilihi ma ‘alimtu minhu wa ma lam a‘lam wa a‘udzu bika minash-sharri kullihi ‘ajilihi wa ajilihi ma ‘alimtu minhu wa ma lam a‘lam.
50.translation: O Allah, I ask You for all good, immediate and delayed, what I know of it and what I do not know. And I seek refuge in You from all evil, immediate and delayed, what I know of it and what I do not know.
